alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 01 at 4:53AM AKDT until November 01 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with near Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 inches. Visibility one half mile or less at times. Winds gusting to 50 mph. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island. * WHEN...Until 4 PM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Visibility will be very low at times. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Near Blizzard conditions will reduce visibility to less than one half mile at times.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling, especially in open areas.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
